title: #NetworkAdapter.v1_0_0.NetworkAdapter

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ResetSettingsToDefault.description: This action is to clear the settings back to factory defaults.
ResetSettingsToDefault.longDescription: This action shall perform a reset of all active and pending settings back to factory default settings upon reset of the network adapter.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

TargetEnabled.description: State of the target, which can be enabled or disabled.
TargetEnabled.longDescription: State of the target, which can be enabled or disabled.

BootLun.description: Current target boot LUN. Value range: 0-255.
BootLun.longDescription: Current target boot LUN. Value range: 0-255.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

NetworkPortCount.description: The number of physical ports on this controller.
NetworkPortCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of physical ports on this controller.

NetworkDeviceFunctionCount.description: The maximum number of physical functions available on this controller.
NetworkDeviceFunctionCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of physical functions available on this controller.

DataCenterBridging.description: Data Center Bridging (DCB) for this controller.
DataCenterBridging.longDescription: This object shall contain capability, status, and configuration values related to Data Center Bridging (DCB) for this controller.

VirtualizationOffload.longDescription: This object shall contain capability, status, and configuration values related to virtualization offload for this controller.

NPIV.description: N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) capabilties for this controller.
NPIV.longDescription: This object shall contain N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) capabilties for this controller.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FirmwarePackageVersion.description: The version of the user-facing firmware package.
FirmwarePackageVersion.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the version number of the user-facing firmware package.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

PCIeDevices.description: Contains the members of this collection.

NetworkPorts.description: Contains the members of this collection.

NetworkDeviceFunctions.description: Contains the members of this collection.

ControllerCapabilities.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the capabilities of this controller.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Capable.description: Whether this controller is capable of Data Center Bridging (DCB).
Capable.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this controller is capable of Data Center Bridging (DCB).

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DriverName.description: Driver name of the network adapter.
DriverName.longDescription: This property shall contain the driver name defined by the manufacturer for the network adapter.

Name.longDescription: This property indicates the name of the network adapter.

DriverVersion.description: Driver version of the network adapter.
DriverVersion.longDescription: This property shall contain the driver version defined by the manufacturer for the network adapter.

CardManufacturer.description: The manufacturer of the network card.
CardManufacturer.longDescription: This property shall contain the manufacturer information about the network card.

CardModel.description: The model string of the network card.
CardModel.longDescription: This property shall contain the model information about the network card.

DeviceLocator.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the network adapter device locator.

SlotNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the network adapter device slot number.

Position.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the network adapter container.

NetworkTechnology.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the network adapter NetworkTechnology.

RootBDF.longDescription: This property indicates the root port BDF (Bus, Device, Function) resource allocated by the BIOS for the network adapter.

FirmwareVersion.description: The firmware version of the network adapter.
FirmwareVersion.longDescription: This property shall contain the firwmare version as defined by the manufacturer for the network adapter.

VenderId.longDescription: This property indicates the VenderId for the network adapter.

DeviceId.longDescription: This property indicates the DeviceId for the network adapter.

SubsystemVenderId.longDescription: This property indicates the SubsystemVenderId for the network adapter.

SubsystemDeviceId.longDescription: This property indicates the SubsystemDeviceId for the network adapter.

Configuration.longDescription: This property specifies configuration of the current NIC.

MctpEnabled.longDescription: This property indicates the MCTP state for the network adapter.

HotPlugSupported.longDescription: This property indicates the HotPlug state for the network adapter.

HotPlugAttention.description: Notification hot swap status of the Network adapter
HotPlugAttention.longDescription: This property indicates the Notification hot swap status for the network adapter.

OrderlyHotplugCtrlStatus.description: The state of the HotPlug Controller.
OrderlyHotplugCtrlStatus.longDescription: This property indicates the network adapter HotPlug Controller state, used to identify whether the network adapter is Operable.

BoardId.longDescription: This property indicates the board ID for the network adapter.

BoardIdHex.description: The hexadecimal format of the network adapter board ID.
BoardIdHex.longDescription: This property indicates the hexadecimal number of the board ID for the network adapter.

ComponentUniqueID.longDescription: The property value indicates the unique identifier of each component.

PCBVersion.longDescription: This property indicates the PCB version for the network adapter.

AssociatedResource.longDescription: This property indicates the associated resource for the network adapter.

VirtualEthernetInterfaces.description: Contains the members of this collection.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumDescriptions.SF: The current NIC works in single-channel mode.
enumDescriptions.NPAR: The current NIC works in multi-channel mode.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MaxDeviceLogins.description: The maximum number of N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) logins allowed simultaneously from all ports on this controller.
MaxDeviceLogins.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the maximum number of N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) logins allowed simultaneously from all ports on this controller.

MaxPortLogins.description: The maximum number of N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) logins allowed per physical port on this controller.
MaxPortLogins.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the maximum number of N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) logins allowed per physical port on this controller.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Effective.description: Specifies whether the latest configuration takes effect.
Effective.longDescription: This property specifies whether the latest NIC configuration takes effect.

PortsConfig.longDescription: This property specifies the configuration of the network ports.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Manufacturer.description: The manufacturer or OEM of this network adapter.
Manufacturer.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain a value that represents the manufacturer of the network adapter.

Model.description: The model string for this network adapter.
Model.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the information about how the manufacturer references this network adapter.

SKU.description: The manufacturer SKU for this network adapter.
SKU.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) for the network adapter.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number for this network adapter.
SerialNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the serial number for the network adapter.

PartNumber.description: Part number for this network adapter.
PartNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the part number for the network adapter as defined by the manufacturer.

Controllers.description: The set of network controllers ASICs that make up this NetworkAdapter.
Controllers.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the set of network controllers ASICs that make up this NetworkAdapter.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

NetworkPorts.description: Contains the members of this collection.

NetworkDeviceFunctions.description: Contains the members of this collection.

NetworkAdapter.description: A NetworkAdapter represents the physical network adapter capable of connecting to a computer network.  Examples include but are not limited to Ethernet, Fibre Channel, and converged network adapters.
NetworkAdapter.longDescription: A NetworkAdapter represents the physical network adapter capable of connecting to a computer network.  Examples include but are not limited to Ethernet, Fibre Channel, and converged network adapters.

enumDescriptions.Ethernet: The port is capable of connecting to an Ethernet network.
enumDescriptions.FC: The port is capable of connecting to a Fibre Channel network.
enumDescriptions.iSCSI: The port is capable of connecting to an iSCSI network.
enumDescriptions.FCoE: The port is capable of connecting to an FCoE network.
enumDescriptions.OPA: The port is capable of connecting to an OPA network.
enumDescriptions.IB: The port is capable of connecting to an InfiniBand network.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PFId.description: ID of the current port function.
PFId.longDescription: This property specifies the ID of the current port function.

Protocol.longDescription: This property specifies the type of the protocol used by the port.

PermanentAddress.longDescription: This property specifies the NIC MAC address of the port.

iSCSIAddress.longDescription: This property specifies the iSCSI MAC address of the port.

FCoEFipMACAddress.longDescription: This property specifies the FCoE MAC address of the port.

MinBandwidth.longDescription: This property specifies the minimum bandwidth of the port. Value range: 0-100.

MaxBandwidth.longDescription: This property specifies the maximum bandwidth of the port. Value range: 0-100.

FCoEWWNN.longDescription: This property specifies the FCoE WWNN of the port.

FCoEWWPN.longDescription: This property specifies the FCoE WWPN of the port.

WWNN.longDescription: This property specifies the WWNN of the port.

WWPN.longDescription: This property specifies the WWPN of the port.

VlanMode.longDescription: This property specifies the VLAN mode of the port.

VlanId.description: ID of a VLAN for PF.
VlanId.longDescription: This property specifies the VLAN ID of the port. Value range: 0-4094.

VlanPriority.longDescription: This property specifies the VLAN priority of the port. Value range: 0-7.

VlanTrunkRange.longDescription: This property specifies the trunk range of the VLAN.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PortId.longDescription: This property specifies the ID of the current port.

MultifunctionMode.longDescription: This property specifies the multi-channel mode.

SRIOVEnabled.longDescription: This property specifies whether the SR-IOV technology is enabled. The SR-IOV technology allows a PCIe device to be virtualized into multiple virtual PCIe devices

BootEnabled.longDescription: This property specifies whether the NIC boot is enabled.

BootProtocol.longDescription: This property specifies the boot protocol type of the NIC chip.

VlanId.longDescription: This property specifies the VLAN ID of the port. Value range: 0-4094.

SANBootEnabled.longDescription: This property specifies whether the SAN boot is enabled.

PFsInfo.longDescription: This property specifies the PF configuration of the current NIC.

BootToTarget.description: Setting of boot to target, which can be enabled or disabled.
BootToTarget.longDescription: Setting of boot to target, which can be enabled or disabled.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SRIOVVEPACapable.description: Whether this controller supports Single Root Input/Output Virtualization (SR-IOV) in Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator (VEPA) mode.
SRIOVVEPACapable.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this controller supports Single Root Input/Output Virtualization (SR-IOV) in Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator (VEPA) mode.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DeviceMaxCount.description: The maximum number of Virtual Functions (VFs) supported by this controller.
DeviceMaxCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the maximum number of Virtual Functions (VFs) supported by this controller.

NetworkPortMaxCount.description: The maximum number of Virtual Functions (VFs) supported per network port for this controller.
NetworkPortMaxCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the maximum number of Virtual Functions (VFs) supported per network port for this controller.

MinAssignmentGroupSize.description: The minimum number of Virtual Functions (VFs) that can be allocated or moved between physical functions for this controller.
MinAssignmentGroupSize.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the minimum number of Virtual Functions (VFs) that can be allocated or moved between physical functions for this controller.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SRIOV.longDescription: This object shall contain Single-Root Input/Output Virtualization (SR-IOV) capabilities.

enumDescriptions.NORMAL: The VLAN mode of the NIC is common mode.
enumDescriptions.FILTERING: The VLAN mode of the NIC is filtering.
enumDescriptions.QINQ: The VLAN mode of the NIC is QinQ.
